questions.text: "We don't know what will find. Deep behind enemy lines."
questions.explanation:
Mission 3:16.

	John 3:16 "For God so loved the world he gave his only begotten son that whosoever believeth in Him shall have everlasting light."

questions.text: "Send a giant out, we'll take him down with the Word and the Spirit."
questions.explanation:
People of God.

	This song is found on Carman's "Mission 3:16" CD.

questions.text: "There'll never be a time that He would ever turn his back on me."
questions.explanation:
Never Be.

	This is a beautiful song about how great God's love is for all of us.

questions.text: "Lord, you know I love you, love you from the bottom of my heart."
questions.explanation:
Jesus is the Lamb.

	This song is also on the "Mission 3:16" CD.

questions.text: "God, You see this worthless piece of trash over here?"
questions.explanation:
The Courtroom.

	It is the Devil who is saying that line in "The Courtroom". This is one of my favorite Carman songs. It's about the importance of having your name written in "The Lambs Book of Life".

questions.text: "After many plague, people fled and then they headed for the promise land."
questions.explanation:
Do I Do.

	This song is also found on the "Mission 3:16" CD. Carman sings about trusting God in this song. "Do I do yes, I say, trust in you, Lord all the way."

questions.text: "Remember that you're not alone wiith the cross to bear each day."
questions.explanation:
We Are Not Ashamed.

	According to the CD booklet, he sang this song on the "March for Jesus". I can't think of a more fitting song to sing than one proclaiming "We are not ashamed of the Gospel or His name."

questions.text: "Lead me not into temptation."
questions.explanation:
The Prayer Anthem.

	The Lord's Prayer (which this song comes from) can be found in Matthew 6:9-13.

questions.text: "The rod of God will stop the attack."
questions.explanation:
Slam.

	This song also comes from the "Mission 3:16" CD. Carman became a Christian after seeing an "Andrae Crouch" concert. It was then that he gave his life to Jesus.

questions.text: "Help me remember this truth I've learned."
questions.explanation:
All in Life.

	This is a great song because sometimes we all slip and we need God to help us to "remember what we've learned."

questions.text: "With the facts we're gonna spread God's word."
questions.explanation:
R.I.O.T.

	R.I.O.T. stands for Righteous Invasion of Truth.

questions.text: "Giving glory to the Lord today."
questions.explanation:
My Story.

	Carman was born in New Jersey.

questions.text: "There is an answer to all answers."
questions.explanation:
There is a God.

	Carman has been performing for over 25 years.

questions.text: "Come on everybody, listen to my story. Story about my Jesus."
questions.explanation:
Amen.

	Amen means "so be it." It is the very last word in the Bible.

questions.text: "God holds up the universe."
questions.explanation:
Great God.

	In 2001, "Carman: The Champion" become the longest running Christian movie in theatres.

questions.text: "It doesn't matter who you are."
questions.explanation:
The River.

	This song is on the "R.I.O.T." CD. It is also done beautifully in Spanish (El Rio) on his "Lo Mejor" CD.

questions.text: "The kingdom of God is on a forceful advance."
questions.explanation:
Marchin' and Movin'.

	This song is on his "America Again" CD.

questions.text: "The bottom line, the way to win: is up with Jesus, down with sin."
questions.explanation:
Sunday School Rock.

	This is a great song about how important Jesus is to us. "Only Christ can set you free."

questions.text: "The only hope for America is Jesus."
questions.explanation:
America Again.

	This is the first Carman song I ever heard. It is extremely powerful.

questions.text: "Ezekiel, Daniel all across the nation say."
questions.explanation:
Memorize the 66 Books.

	This song is on the "Yo! Kidz" CD. It helps children remember the 66 Books of the Bible.  Much of my info came from the Carman Ministries website at www.carman.org. You might wish to check it out to learn more about Carman and his ministries.  I hope you enjoyed the quiz.
